text: Jameh Mosque of Marand is located in the center of Marand, which was built in the year of 731 AH in the reign of Abu Sa'id Bahadur Khan, according to the Mihrab of the mosque. The Mihrab is located in the southern part of the mosque and is emblazoned with filled with Quran Āyah And Kufic and Stucco. == Sources == Category:Mosques in East Azerbaijan Province Category:Mosque buildings with domes Category:National Works of Iran Marand
title: Jameh Mosque of Marand
